name: elevate-for-humanity
description: Workforce development and career training website

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r src/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp src/*.html dist/
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run serve"
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/assets/css dist/assets/js dist/assets/images

author: Elevate for Humanity
